## ConnectionDB.init() method

Initialize a set of connection DBs for a workspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static init(checker: IConnectionChecker): ConnectionDB[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  checker | [IConnectionChecker](./blockly.iconnectionchecker_interface.md) | The workspace's connection checker, used to decide if connections are valid during a drag. |

**Returns:**

[ConnectionDB](./blockly.connectiondb_class.md)<!-- -->\[\]

Array of databases.
